entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Light snow beginning late this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
